relationships.description: The kettle is attached to the protagonist's hand, as indicated by the phrase "his hand was glued to the kettle".
The kettle is pulling the protagonist and others forward, as indicated by the phrase "the kettle pulling them onward".
The protagonist arrives at Grimmauld Place, as indicated by the phrase "they had arrived in the gloomy basement kitchen of number twelve, Grimmauld Place".
